message:
No, that Result call can lead to deadlocks.

I don't think it makes sense to do a service call on a property read. That property should probably be a method. For more info: [http://blog.stephencleary.com/2013/01/async-oop-3-properties.html](http://blog.stephencleary.com/2013/01/async-oop-3-properties.html)
